text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Wallnut. Super Tall. Immune to throw-based abilities.

$(br)$(#bd951a)People wonder if there's a rivalry between Wall-nut and Tall-nut. Tall-nut laughs a rich baritone laugh. "How could there be anything between us? We are brothers. If you knew what Wall-nut has done for me..." Tall-nut's voice trails off and he smiles knowingly.

pages.title: â›¨ Reinforce Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that blocks most zombies from going over.
